content:
Configure Knowledge Record Pages with Dynamic Forms

Use the Article Personalization for Knowledge release update to upgrade your knowledge record pages with Dynamic Forms. With Dynamic Forms, you can migrate the fields and sections from your Knowledge record page layout as individual components into the Lightning App Builder.

Enable Dynamic Forms by completing these steps:

Go to the Knowledge Record Home page that you want to configure with Dynamic forms.
Configure the Knowledge Record Home page with Dynamic forms by following the steps in Migrate a Record Page to Dynamic Forms.

To add filter conditions, see Dynamic Lightning Pages. 

See also:
Considerations and Limitations for Article Personalization for Knowledge and Dynamic Forms
Lightning Article Editor
Article Personalization for Knowledge
title: Configuring Knowledge Record Pages with Dynamic Forms
